transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: IndiaMART se bol rahe hain na?
Customer: Ji main IndiaMART se bol rahi hoon.
Customer: Aji sir good afternoon, main Arup Enterprise Kolkata se bol raha hoon.
Executive: Ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Bola mam hum logo ke sath jo IndiaMART ka jo deal hua tha uska jo ek to letter head aap log hum logo ko bana ke diye the to usko thoda provide kar sakte hain?
Executive: Ek second aapki company ka naam ek baar bataiye kya naam hai?
Customer: Arup Enterprise A R U P Arup Enterprise.
Executive: A R R U P Arup Enterprise.
Executive: Accha ek second dekh rahe hain.
Customer: Harish sir Kolkata Harish sir.
Executive: Haan haan samajh gayi.
Executive: Accha aapka ye account abhi dekh rahe hain Tejas dekh rahe hain I think so aapke account manager. Aur bataiye aapko kya chahiye sir main isme se dekh ke bata deti hoon.
Customer: Actually actually actually actually actually mera bank mein ek CC loan chal raha hai usko update karna hai loan ke liye.
Customer: To kuch information manga hai ki aap logo ke sath kis kis ke sath franchise liya hua hai kis kis ke sath aap online kam kar raha hai distributor kis kis ka sath hai dealership kis kis ka sath hai isko provide karna pad raha hai humko. Theek hai?
Executive: To usme hum log kya de sakte hain aapko?
Customer: To aapka sath jo IndiaMART ke sath hum log ko char panch saal se jo kam kar rahe hain aapke sath uska to ek to ek to letter to bana hai na Arup Enterprise ke sath jo IndiaMART kam kar raha hai.
Customer: Uska pay out kar raha ho 125000 kabhi kabhi 70000 jab jis saal mein jaisa hua hai theek hai uska to koi letter head to hai to mujhe thoda provide kar sakte hain IndiaMART ke sath.
Executive: Letter head to nahi hai magar aapko invoice mil jayengi sari jab se aapne pay kiye IndiaMART par invoice agar chahiye to wo puri aapko mil jayengi.
Customer: Haan haan haan wahi de dijiye mujhe sir to wo aapko invoice aapko main bata rahi hoon kahan se aap download kar sakte hain aap wo IndiaMART login karte hain seller panel wala?
Customer: IndiaMART to login hai to kam to kar raha hoon IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan kam kar rahe hain wo IndiaMART login hai usme desktop pe login hai kahan login hai?
Customer: Mobile pe.
Executive: Mobile pe mobile pe to option nahi aayega desktop pe login ho sakte hain laptop wagere pe login ho sakta hai to main bata do download kahan se karna hai aapko.
Customer: Abhi to wo function nahi hai mere paas laptop to hai nahi.
Executive: Accha accha accha accha accha accha ye bataiye email id wagere access karte hain aap apni?
Customer: Haan mera email id hai to.
Executive: To agar us email id pe dekhiye abhi to main waise try kar rahi hoon waise to aap batayega ki aapko receive hua hai ya ki nahi nahi to else main bata dungi kahan se aap khud bhi download kar sakte hain ek second dijiyega mujhe.
Customer: Aap mujhe mail kar dijiye ya aap mujhe whatsapp mein dal dijiye. Main wahi keh rahi hoon nahi nahi actually main kya hai hum mail karenge to depend karta hai ki mail id aapke paas wo wali honi chahiye main ek baar wahi try kar rahi hoon ek minute line kariye.
Customer: Haan haan baki aap aap apne side se karoge na to usse kya hoga ki aapko jitna chahiye utna aap le sakte ho main ye keh rahi hoon ki jo jo detail chahiye wo pura aapko portal mein mil jayegi abhi kya hai ki main limited aapko cheeze bata sakti hoon bhejne ke liye.
Customer: Right abhi to filhal nahi hai mere paas invoice register aapki register mail id yahi hai Arupkumar1234@gmail.com?
Customer: Ekdam ekdam yahi hai.
Executive: Yahi hai aapki?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir maine isme bheja hai apne side se but I just suggest ki ek baar na aap wo kar lena seller panel login kar lena hum guide kar denge kahan se aapko karna hai.
Customer: Customer care invoice.
Executive: Aapko aayi hai?
Customer: Customer care please find invoice of payment for this service. Maximizer generated 29 May 2025.
Executive: Maine aapko 2021 tak ka bheja hai agar aapko aur bhi chahiye 2020 ka wo bhi download kar sakte hain aap.
Customer: Accha accha.
Executive: Ye aapka jo portal hai na seller wala usme login rehta hai sab kuch usme ye detail hai.
Executive: To isliye main bol rahi thi agar system pe aap login rahe to main ek baar properly guide kar dungi aap isi ek second kab aap system wagere pe rahenge?
Customer: Aur ek saal purana kar dijiye na.
Executive: Sir maine bhej diya aapko 2025 ka lekin isme to 35000 72000 payment kiye the is baar hum last time.
Executive: Ek second aapne do part mein kiya tha sir matlab ek may mein starting mein hua tha to do part kiya tha do part ka maine aapko bheja hai sir. Fir aapne jo payment kari thi 2022 mein kari thi sir. 2025 se pehle 2022 mein kari thi aapne.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan fir 2022 mein bhi aapne pehle kuch amount kiya fir kuch kiya fir kuch kiya aise karke teen char padi hai invoice. Fir aapka 2021 mein aapne kiya tha.
Executive: Aur usse pehle 2020 ka bhi hai 2019 ka sara sir data wo mil jayega agar aap seller wala login karoge aap sara dekh sakte ho apne site se login karke.
Executive: Maine to abhi aapko just suggestion ke liye kuch bheji hoon taki agar aapko aur cheeze agar aapko call kar lo directly.
Executive: Ya to aap batana kab hai to hum aapko dobara khud reach kar lenge aap batao kaise aap comfortable ho.
Customer: Koi baat nahi main isko provide karta hoon bank mein agar koi aur kuch mangega to main aapke mang lunga.
Executive: Coordinate kar lena aap humse aur dusri cheez ye kariyega sir ke ek baar baat jab kar lenge aap to better ye rahega ki hum system pe aapko bata payenge sara data kahan par hai.
Customer: Theek hai?
Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi theek hai.
Executive: Chalo abhi itna to mil gaya na ki abhi dobara mail aur bhej do aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi isse kam chala lenge de dete hain.
Executive: Haan isse kam chala lenge theek hai sir aapka ye ek feedback bhi aa raha tha mere paas to main isko close kar doon shayad ye invoice ke related feedback hai aapka. Main close karke ye dal dungi.
Customer: Haan haan haan ji.
Executive: Okay sir okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs letterhead for bank loan update.

- Wants details of IndiaMART association for loan.



Resolution:

- Executive explained letterhead unavailability.

- Executive sent invoices to customer's email.

- Executive guided to download invoices from seller panel.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the provided invoices.

- Executive offered further assistance if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- invoices, seller panel, loan, letterhead, email
